Subject: Literary Filk
Description: Authors from Peter Beagle to Jerry Pournelle have included bits of song and poetry in their fiction, and and many SFF stories have been set to music.  Join local Filkers as they discuss the hows and wheres of placing songs in fiction and sing some songs from their favorite books.   Speakers include:Clif Flynt, Mark Bernstein, Tom Smith - Track: Media  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
